artist: Painter: After Giacomo Sementi; Designer: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Guilio Tomba
description: Christ carrying the cross, St. Francis behind ; St. Michael the Archangel holding a spear with one knee on devil; St Sebastian tied to tree with arrow in his side infront of Christ
inscription:
Signature, Title,  and Inscription

Below image in black: G. Sementi dip.  F. Rosaspina dis.  G. Tomba inc. / GESU CHRISTO PORTANTE LE CROCE, L\'ARCANGELO /  MICHELE, E LI ST. SEBASTIANO E FRANCISCO  | on sheet in pencil: 2-392
title: Jesus Christ Carrying the Cross, with Archangel Michael, and Sts. Sebastian and Francis
